channel.title: Cache unzips wrongly - help me -
channel.description:
Hello, I made my client download a cache. When it is ready downloading the cmd gives this error:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2s7coxw.png[/img]
Than the client says: Error, Please report!
What Happens: The client downloads the cache and unzips it. It gets in C:/PDcache/PDcache instead of C:/PDcache How do I change this?
Many thanks.

item.title: Cache unzips wrongly - help me -
item.dc:creator: @yB1 yB
item.description:

Hello,
